Traveling along the coasts of Portugal and Morocco, guests can surf breathtaking beaches or explore local nature and culture. Its expandable trailer houses a kitchen, living room, bathroom, and terrace, providing a comfortable yet adventurous experience. A 7-day trip starts at $855 per person.
